reviews.review: It's a good cinecomic, not an outstanding one. Thanos is neither the best nor the worst Marvel movie villain. The plot creaks in many moments, but it never crumbles. Maybe there was just too much hype for this movie, but I expected something more, it's a B- for a movie that should have been an A+
I thought the movie was kind of boring. Even action was not all that great.
tHE MORE i WATCH THIS MOVIE, THE FUN IT BE

Fantastic movie, quite possibly the best of the MCU. Thanos is thrilling, terrifying, and at the same time, not really such a bad guy. The stakes are high, the deaths are heartbreaking, the action is fantastic, and the acting is incredible. I haven't been a big fan of Chris Hemsworth's Thor in the past (mostly because of how his character was written), but he really shines here. He steals almost every scene he's in. Same could be said for Thanos, Iron Man, Doctor Strange, and a few other characters. And Tom Holland's acting right at the end there...wow! Incredible!
It was "okay." Great special effects, poor writing. But hey, it's not William Shakspear.
Shitty movie not worth the money. Ended poorly!!!!!
Absolutely the best Marvel movie to date!

took the kids to watch. I hated it! Vicious, depressing and instigates violence. Wish I could get my money back. Of course there will be a follow-up to this crap. It made me feel like I was back to early days when I asked my military step-father about the reason for war. He answered me that there was not enough resources in the world to sustain so many people. He said ethnic cleansing was a necessary evil and the military had to do it. Hey... Just pass the Kool-Aid!
Good, not great. They tried to squeeze too much into a single film (yes nerds I know thereâ€™s a sequel).

This is my favorite superhero movie, beating out X-Men: Days of Future Past. Right off the bat, you get goosebumps as you fear the Black Order and Thanos and as the rest of the movie plays, each character (except for Star-Lord which is understandable given the situation) has to make important decisions and choices to defeat Thanos, even if it means losing their own lives. My  personal favorite moments were with Thor and Rocket.
